title: Aeveron - Impending Doom mp3 (2011)
description:
Aeveron



Aeveron is a German Melodic Black Metal band - formed in March of 2002. Six adept musicians decided to unify. Their diverse musical influences and ideas in one formation called Aeveron.

Soon it became apparent that the created pieces could hardly be assigned to one specific musical style.

But since the so called Ã¢â‚¬Å“stereotypical thinkingÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ has become indispensable even in the music scene, Aeveron consider that the term Ã¢â‚¬Å“Melodic Sweden DeathÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ seems to be adequate as an orientation.

They released three full length albums up to date. "Construality" came to light on October 30th, 2004. It contained 9 songs, and it was released under "Northern Silence Productions" label. In 2008 (October 24th specifically) they released "Existential Dead End" with, again 9 songs, this time under a different label, "Battlegod Productions". And what's their last job to date, "Impending Doom", that was released on September 1st, 2011, this time with no label, and containing 10 songs, starting with an instrumental introduction.
